test-case.name: cbcl-divide-dayTimeDuration-001
test-case.description: test division of xs:dayTimeDuration by 0
test-case.test: declare function local:dayTimeDuration($days as xs:integer) as xs:dayTimeDuration { xs:dayTimeDuration(concat("P", $days, "D")) }; local:dayTimeDuration(2) div 0

test-case.name: cbcl-divide-dayTimeDuration-002
test-case.description: test division of xs:dayTimeDuration by 1
test-case.test: declare function local:dayTimeDuration($days as xs:integer) as xs:dayTimeDuration { xs:dayTimeDuration(concat("P", $days, "D")) }; local:dayTimeDuration(2) div 1

test-case.name: cbcl-divide-dayTimeDuration-003
test-case.description: test possible overflow in divison of xs:dayTimeDuration by

test-case.name: cbcl-div-001
test-case.description: Test behaviour of division operator when presented with an expression with static type duration
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1Y") else xs:yearMonthDuration("P1Y") }; local:f(false()) div xs:yearMonthDuration("P1M")

test-case.name: cbcl-div-002
test-case.description: Test behaviour of division operator when presented with an expression with static type duration
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1Y") else xs:yearMonthDuration("P1Y") }; local:f(true()) div xs:yearMonthDuration("P1M")

test-case.name: cbcl-div-003
test-case.description: Test behaviour of division operator when presented with an expression with static type duration
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1D") else xs:dayTimeDuration("P1D") }; local:f(false()) div xs:dayTimeDuration("PT1H")

test-case.name: cbcl-div-004
test-case.description: Test behaviour of division operator when presented with an expression with static type duration
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1D") else xs:dayTimeDuration("P1D") }; local:f(true()) div xs:dayTimeDuration("PT1H")

test-case.name: cbcl-div-005
test-case.description: Test behaviour of division operator when presented with an expression with static type duration
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:yearMonthDuration("P1M") }; xs:yearMonthDuration("P1Y") div local:f(false())

test-case.name: cbcl-div-006
test-case.description: Test behaviour of division operator when presented with an expression with static type duration
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:yearMonthDuration("P1M") }; xs:yearMonthDuration("P1Y") div local:f(true())

test-case.name: cbcl-div-007
test-case.description: Test behaviour of division operator when presented with an expression with static type duration
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:dayTimeDuration("PT1H") }; xs:dayTimeDuration("P1D") div local:f(false())

test-case.name: cbcl-div-008
test-case.description: Test behaviour of division operator when presented with an expression with static type duration
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:dayTimeDuration("PT1H") }; xs:dayTimeDuration("P1D") div local:f(true())

test-case.name: cbcl-div-009
test-case.description: Test behaviour of division operator when presented with an expression with static type duration
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:yearMonthDuration("P1M") }; local:f(false()) div local:f(false())

test-case.name: cbcl-div-010
test-case.description: Test behaviour of division operator when presented with an expression with static type duration
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:yearMonthDuration("P1M") }; local:f(true()) div local:f(false())

test-case.name: cbcl-div-011
test-case.description: Test behaviour of division operator when presented with an expression with static type duration
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:dayTimeDuration("PT1H") }; local:f(false()) div local:f(false())

test-case.name: cbcl-div-012
test-case.description: Test behaviour of division operator when presented with an expression with static type duration
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:dayTimeDuration("PT1H") }; local:f(false()) div local:f(true())

test-case.name: cbcl-div-013
test-case.description: Test behaviour of division operator when presented with an expression with static type duration
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P2M") else xs:yearMonthDuration("P2M") }; local:f(false()) div 2

test-case.name: cbcl-div-014
test-case.description: Test behaviour of division operator when presented with an expression with static type duration
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P2M") else xs:yearMonthDuration("P2M") }; local:f(true()) div 2

test-case.name: cbcl-div-015
test-case.description: Test behaviour of division operator when presented with an expression with static type duration
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1D") else xs:dayTimeDuration("P1D") }; local:f(false()) div 2

test-case.name: cbcl-div-016
test-case.description: Test behaviour of division operator when presented with an expression with static type duration
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x) { if ($x) then xs:duration("P1M") else xs:dayTimeDuration("P1D") }; local:f(true()) div 2
